text: Customer Obligations: Before purchasing any mobile modem, the Customer shall check Irancell network coverage in the intended area using the “coverage map” available on Irancell website.‌ Since maximum coverage is provided in all areas and mobile modems can be used in various parts, it is not possible to return a modem due to lack of coverage. In order to use Irancell services and products, the Customer shall accept the terms and conditions of the related service as well as the present terms and conditions. The Customer shall be responsible to enter accurate and correct identity information while purchasing a service or product. In case any inaccurate information is entered by the Customer, central authentication system will not be able to generate reference number; therefore, service registration and activation will not be possible and Irancell shall have no responsibility in this regard. The Customer shall pay the payable amount stated in Irancell Online Store via available online payment gateway. The Customer undertakes to prepare the required documents and provide them to the postman at the time of delivering the package. Otherwise, the postman may avoid delivering the package. The Customer undertakes to avoid receiving damaged packages from postman. Irancell shall not be responsible if, after receiving the package, the Customer finds out that it is damaged. The Customer undertakes to provide updated information and documents at the time of placing the order. In case any discrepancy is discovered at any stage, Irancell shall be entitled to avoid delivering the product or activating the service.‌‌‌ The Customer shall provide the 10-digit postal code of its present domicile to be registered.‌ Please refer to your utility bills (fixed phone, water, electricity or gas) to get the accurate postal code of your place of residence. Please be careful while entering the postal code and other information since the information recorded in your file (in Irancell system) is the basis for providing you with all Irancell gifts and services. Irancell Obligations: Irancell undertakes to deliver to the Customer the purchased product or service within the specified period and in accordance with the terms and conditions referred to on Irancell Online Store website.‌ Irancell shall post the purchased product to the address announced by the Customer. In the event that the Customer pays the price of a product or service the provision of which is found to be impossible later, Irancell shall refund the amount to the Customer. Purchase Cancellation: Customers who purchase their mobile modem via Irancell Online Stores may cancel their order within 7 business days after placing their order (prior to receiving the modem) and ask for a refund.‌‌ To ask for a refund, the purchaser (the person under whose name the SIM Card is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 700 from Irancell lines or 09377000000 from other lines or may raise their request through online chat with Call Center agents.‌ (It’s better to cancel your purchase as soon as possible in order to avoid any payment or waste of time.)‌ If you cancel your order (before receiving the mobile modem), the amount will be returned to your Irancell Online Store Wallet and then you will be able to transfer the amount to your bank account or purchase again.‌ Please note that in case you wish to cancel your mobile modem purchase, you should not take delivery of the purchased product from the postman since the mobile modems delivered will not be subject to refund policy. Only the amounts paid using a bank card connected to a centralized account can be refunded. Payments made using a gift card or other similar cards are not refundable and Irancell undertakes no responsibility for returning the same. The Limit on Number of SIM Cards Owned by Customers:‌‌ Please note that according to CRA instructions, it is only possible to register for and activate maximum ten (10) SIM Cards for each Iranian natural persons and three (3) SIM Cards for each non-Iranian natural person.‌ If the SIM Card owner decides to transfer the ownership of the SIM Card to another person, they should follow all Irancell regulations in this regard.‌‌ All the responsibilities associated with the SIM Card shall lie with the SIM Card owner until the ownership of the SIM Card is legally transferred to another person.‌‌‌ Regular Delivery: When the postman arrives, the person under whose name the SIM Card has been registered needs to hand over a valid identity document and a copy of the same for identification purposes.‌ Valid identity documents for Iranian nationals shall include one of the following: Smart National ID Card New birth certificate containing a digital photo and National ID (a birth certificate lacking a photo shall not be valid) ‌‌ Old National ID Card together with the smart National ID Card receipt (sealed by an ICT service center, electronic services counter, post office, or civil registry office/a certificate approved by civil registry office/a National ID certificate)‌ A valid identity document for foreign nationals shall include one of the following: A valid passport, Amayesh card, identity card, green card or VIP residence permit for foreign nationals. Other documents such as visa shall not be acceptable. If the postman arrives at the announced address and the Subscriber is not present, the Subscriber may call Irancell Call Center by dialing 700 from Irancell lines or 09377000000 from other lines and ask for delivery of the product by the postman again. Express Delivery: If you choose express delivery to receive the product within your selected time period, you need to be present at the announced address; otherwise, the product will be sent through regular delivery within 7 days.

Before changing SIM card ownership, the seller (initial SIM card owner) should delete all the information stored on the SIM card and then deliver it to the buyer; otherwise, the seller will be held responsible for all possible SIM card misuses in the future. Note that when the delivery and ID authentication personnel are sent to the chosen address, the original seller SIM card will be delivered to the buyer. So, for the process of SIM card ownership change to take place, it is necessary that the original SIM card be available; otherwise, it’s not possible to change the ownership with another, new SIM card. If the seller and buyer or one of them are not present at the chosen address to receive the SIM card, the SIM card ownership change process will be stopped and they will be charged for future SIM card deliveries. After filing an online request for change of ownership, SIM card will be soft suspended and then reactivated once the request is successfully completed.

Economical Package: the subscriber can use unlimited data considering the Fair Usage Policy. The Speed of Economical Packages: the subscriber can purchase packages with different speeds, including up to 512 Kbps, up to 1 Mbps, up to 2 Mbps, up to 4 Mbps, or up to 8Mbps. Fair Usage Policy: The subscriber can use a specific amount of traffic from the chosen package, varying based on the type of the package, and should the subscriber exceed that amount, the speed drops to 256 Kbps. No more than 1 economical package can be purchased simultaneously. Economical packages can be purchased by dialing the code *555# and using MyIrancell superapplication. When economical and limited data packages are purchased simultaneously, regardless of the packages’ expiry dates, the limited data package is used first and the economical data package is used afterwards. If two packages (one economical and one limited) are purchased simultaneously, they will be used as of the purchase date. Thus, the subscriber is responsible for purchasing several packages. If limited and economical packages are used at the same time, their speeds will be different. The limited package has unlimited speed, while the speed of the economical package varies from 512 Kbps to 8 Mbps depending on the package purchased.

Customer Obligations: Before purchasing, the Customer shall check Irancell network coverage in the intended area using the “coverage map” available on Irancell website. The Customer shall be responsible to enter accurate and correct identity information while purchasing a service or product. In case any inaccurate information is entered by the Customer, central authentication system will not be able to generate reference number; therefore, service registration and activation will not be possible and Irancell shall have no responsibility in this regard. The Customer shall pay the payable amount announced in Irancell Online Store via available online payment gateway. The Customer undertakes to prepare the required documents and provide them to the postman at the time of delivering the package. Otherwise, the postman may avoid delivering the package. The Customer undertakes to avoid receiving damaged packages from postman. Irancell shall not be responsible if, after receiving the package, the Customer finds out that it is damaged. The Customer undertakes to provide updated information and documents at the time of placing the order. In case any discrepancy is discovered at any stage, Irancell shall be entitled to avoid delivering the product or activating the services. The Customer shall provide the 10-digit postal code of their domicile to be registered. Please refer to your utility bills (fixed phone, water, electricity or gas) to get the accurate postal code of your place of residence. Please be careful when entering the postal code and other information since the information recorded in your file (in Irancell system) is the basis for providing you Irancell gifts and services. Irancell Obligations: Irancell will be bound to deliver to the Customer, the purchased product or service within 30 working days as of registration and payment by the Customer. Irancell shall send the purchased product to the address which is announced and registered at the time of placing the order by the Customer. In the event that the Customer pays the price of a product or service the provision of which is found to be impossible later, Irancell shall refund the amount to the Customer. Cancellation of product or service purchase before delivery: Customers who purchase optical fiber Internet service via Irancell Online Store gateways may cancel their order within 3 working days after placing their order (prior to receiving the modem or any action with respect to service cabling) and ask for a refund. To ask for a refund, the purchaser (the person under whose name the service is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 789 (using Irancell lines) or 09377890000 (using other lines) or may raise their request through online chat with Call Center agents. (It's better to cancel your purchase as soon as possible, in order to avoid any extra payment or waste of time.) Only the amounts which are paid using a bank card connected to a centralized account can be refunded. The payments made using gift cards or other similar cards are not refundable and Irancell takes no responsibility for returning them. The amounts will only be refunded to the accounts which are used for purchasing the product; Irancell will not refund the amounts to any other account or the accounts belonging to other people. If the order is canceled (before delivery of the product), the amount will be returned to the purchaser’s Irancell Online Store Wallet or bank account. Money-back Guarantee Terms and Conditions: Customers who purchase fiber optic service, if impossible to use the service in the announced address, may ask for a refund. It should be noted that the refund request shall be approved by the Technical Team of Network Division confirming the lack of appropriate coverage which can be examined merely based on the address registered. If the terms and conditions on returning the modem is fully observed, the modem return guarantee may be used in addition to the service refund. Terms and conditions on returning the modem: It is necessary to keep the original package of the modem and avoid throwing it away. All spares should be included in the package while returning the modem. The subscriber shall return the modem to Irancell in its original box. In case of sticking any label, writing anything like address or explanation on the original package of the modem, or tearing and corrupting it, the modem cannot be returned. Return policy does not include technical and apparent flaws such as break, scratch and the like on the body of the modem, which are caused by inappropriate usage of the product. It is necessary to have the invoice in order to go through the return procedure. Change of Ownership: If the owner decides to transfer the ownership to another person, they should follow all Irancell's regulations in this regard. All the responsibilities associated with the service shall lie with the owner until the ownership is legally transferred to another person. In case of change of ownership, the new owner shall not be able to request for a money-back guarantee. Delivery: When the postman arrives, the person under whose name the service has been registered needs to hand over a valid identity document and a copy of the same for identification purposes. Valid identity documents for Iranian nationals shall include one of the following: Smart National ID Card New birth certificate containing a digital photo and National ID (a birth certificate lacking a photo shall not be valid) Old National ID Card together with the smart National ID Card receipt (sealed by an ICT service center, electronic services counter, post office, or civil registry office/a certificate approved by civil registry office/a National ID certificate) Valid identity documents for foreign nationals shall include one of the following: A valid passport, Amayesh card, refugee card, identity card, green card or VIP residence permit for foreign nationals. Other documents such as visa shall not be acceptable. If the postman arrives at the announced address and the Subscriber is not present, the Subscriber may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 789 (using Irancell lines) or 09377890000 (using other lines) and ask for delivery of the product by the postman again. Note: In bad weather conditions (rain and snow), the delivery may be delayed.

The subscribers shall accept the following terms and conditions and undertake to comply with them in order to participate in Irancell auction for golden numbers: 1. Definitions 1.1 “Irancell”, means Irancell Telecommunications Services Company. 1.2 “Auctioneer”, means Irancell Telecommunications Services Company. 1.3 “Subscriber”, means any natural person who is granted the right to use the SIM Card and to establish connection via Irancell network upon registration and acceptance of Master Subscriber Agreement. 1.4 “Bidder”, Either of Irancell prepaid or postpaid Subscribers who participate in the auction for one or more Golden Number(s) upon entering the auction portal and registering their bid. 1.5 “Golden Number”, The SIM cards whose number is defined by Irancell supervisory committee based on the order of the digits and/or repetition of particular digits. 1.6 “e-Auction”, A process through which the Subscribers may enter Irancell auction portal to submit their bid for purchasing one or several Golden SIM Cards. Then upon completion of the registration and payment process, the SIM Card will be transferred to the Bidder with the highest bid. 1.7 “Auction Portal”, Irancell's portal at rond.irancell.ir through which applicants can enroll using their email address and personal password, and participate in the golden numbers auction. 1.8 Close to Auction End: The last 24 hours before the end of an auction is called the Close to Auction End. 1.9 Suggested Opening Bid: The minimum price determined by Irancell for allocation of a Golden Number. The price might differ from number to number. 1.10 Earnest Money Deposit: An amount to be paid via Internet gateway available at Irancell portal by each Subscriber to the nominated account in order to enter each auction, hereinafter referred to as "Deposit". 2. Participants General Conditions 2.1 All Irancell natural persons may go to Irancell auction portal and pay the preset Deposit to participate in the auction and purchase the Golden Numbers. 2.2 In order to be eligible to participate in the auction, it is a must for the participant to be qualified under the applicable law for performing transactions, ownership of the assets and financial rights and to have minimum age of 18 years. Applicants under 18 years old may participate in the auction through their guardian or legal custodian. This way the Golden Number will be registered to the name of the guardian or custodian and can be used by the applicant under the control of the guardian or custodian. 3. Participation Terms: 3.1 All subscribers may use their email address and password to enter their user account via the auction portal and complete the steps. 3.2 To enter the auction, each Subscriber is required to pay at least 20 percent of the amount it wishes to bid for the auction. Such amount will be paid to the nominated account of the auctioneer via the Internet gateway available at Irancell portal. This amount will remain in the said account as Earnest Money Deposit until finalization of the auctions participated by the Subscriber. Note 1: If the Bidder is not among the 3 winners of the auction, the Earnest Money Deposit will be refunded to him/her within 4 working days as of the request for return of the same; otherwise such amount will not be accessible till determination of the final winner (completion of purchase process). Note 2: The deposit will be refunded solely after a request by the Bidder. To this end, the Bidder is required to enter the auction portal after completion of the auctions she/he has participated in, and in case the Bidder is not among the first 3 winners of the auction, the Bidder shall register its request by clicking the "Request on reimbursement to the bank account" by observing provisions under Note 1. Note 3: In case the Bidder participate in several auctions simultaneously and fail to be among the 3 top winners, the deposit made to the joint account will be returned to him if he clicks on “Request for reimbursement to the bank account”; otherwise, the request for reimbursement of the deposit will be postponed to the time when the winner of the auction(s) is finalized when the bidder is among one of the 3 top winners. Note 4: After a request for refund, all the amounts paid as earnest money deposit will be automatically returned to the IBAN defined by the bidder. Therefore, the Customer is required to make the payment using the account which is approved by him for refund. After making the payment, no claims in this respect will be acceptable nor any request for reimbursement of the deposit to an account other than the account from which the first payment is made. Note 5: Only the amounts paid using a bank card connected to a centralized account can be refunded. Payments made using a gift card or other similar cards are not refundable and Irancell undertakes no responsibility for returning the same. Note 6: The IBAN number requested in Portal shall be solely used for cases in which the system fails to refund the deposit automatically for any reason whatsoever. Therefore, the Bidder is required to pay utmost attention in submitting the IBAN number and full name; otherwise, Irancell undertakes no responsibility regarding the mentioned deposit. Note 7: After the end of each auction, the individual who has managed to record the highest bid will be announced as the winner and the succeeding two highest-bidders shall be selected as first and second runners-up. In fact these two people have respectively offered the highest bids following the bid proposed by the winner. Note 8: The auction winner as well as the first and second runners-up shall not transfer their SIM Cards to another individual unless the auction is ended and SIM Card is transferred or the auction is completely canceled. 3.3 Each natural person is allowed to register and activate at most 10 Irancell SIM cards using one National ID number. To participate in the auction, the Subscribers must observe the limit set for SIM Cards ownership. In case the number of a subscriber’s SIM cards reaches the said limit, he can register the SIM card for another person to whom the SIM card will be delivered upon identification of the registered particulars; otherwise, the bidder is required to deactivate one of his SIM cards upon receiving its inactive SIM card. Then, he can refer to one of Irancell authorized dealers or service centers, having his identification documents, address and zip code to complete the registration process and activate its purchased SIM cards. Note 1: In case the subscriber wins several bids at the same time which makes its activated SIM cards together with the SIM cards for which he has granted the priority right to purchase exceeding the said limit, he can pay the full price of each SIM card and register them to the name of another person to whom the SIM card will be delivered upon identification; otherwise, the bidder shall deactivate one of its SIM cards upon receiving the SIM card won in the bid and then activate the aforesaid SIM card by referring to one of the authorized dealers or service centers, having his identification documents, address and zip code to complete the registration process and activate its purchased SIM cards. 3.4 The winner has the right to choose prepaid or postpaid Golden numbers. 3.5 Once the auction results are announced, the winner is required to pay the difference between his bid and the Deposit in the same auction within 48 hours through the Internet gateways available in the auction portal. If the winner fails to pay the amount within the determined deadline, his Deposit will be confiscated to the benefit of Irancell. Note 1: Once the winner pays the full amount and in case he has enough credit in its deposit, they may attend another auction or request the refund of their deposit. 3.6 In case the winner refuses to pay the bid and to complete the registration process or is prevented to do so for any reasons whatsoever, the first runner up will be announced as the winner and is required to fully pay the bid within 48 hours. Should the first runner up fail to timely pay the bid, the second runner up will be selected as the winner and given the same time for payment of the bid. In case none of the winners pays the specified amount, the auction will be announced as null and void. 3.7 The Bidders, except for the top three winners of the auction, may cancel their bid only before the Close to Auction End time. During the “Close to Auction End” time, the Bidders are not allowed to cancel their bid anymore and in case of winning the auction they are responsible for payment of the bid. 3.8 The Bidder shall pay the taxes, duties and the like as per the applicable rules and regulations. After completion of all steps of the auction, payment of the bid and determination of the type of the Number (post-paid or pre-paid), the Golden Number will either be registered under the name of the winner, or will be issued in an inactive form and will be posted to the postal address announced by the Bidder during the registration step free of any post charges. The auctioned SIM Card is activated and delivered to the winner only upon establishing identity, filling out registration form signed by the winner and receiving a copy of winner's ID documents (National Card or ID Card for Iranian nationals and passport for foreign nationals) in case of registration; otherwise, the SIM delivery to the bidder will be made with the address registered in the Registration Form of the bidder so that the bidder can refer to one of Irancell authorized dealers or service centers for completion of the registration and activation of the purchased SIM card. Note 1: Upon the first sign in, the system asks the bidder to complete its individual information. In case the bidder wins the auction, the SIM Card will be delivered to the above mentioned address. Therefore, the bidder must provide accurate information. Should any problem arise as a result of providing incorrect information, Irancell shall not be responsible for the missing SIM card. 4. Governing Law All terms and conditions of participating in the e-auction for Irancell Golden Numbers and probable claims are subject to the laws and regulations of the Islamic Republic of Iran. Since the Subscribers are allowed to participate in the golden number auction using their own SIM Card number, it is necessary to observe the terms and conditions of Master Subscriber Agreement and CRC Resolutions. The Subscriber accepts all terms and conditions of participating in the auction under the present document and waives the right to make any claims or objections in this regard. I hereby undertake that the amount paid into Irancell account is only for purchasing the SIM Card and not for any other transactions. Evidently, in case it is approved that the said amount does not belong to the Customer or that any unauthorized banking transactions are made, the Customer shall be personally responsible for all the possible consequences before the judicial/non-judicial competent authorities.

To use Irancell online store services, the Applicant shall accept and comply with the following terms and conditions: The subscriber is responsible for the validity of all the registration information, sent documents as well as compatibility of the information with the particulars of the individual, not to mention the consequences arising out of presenting false document and incorrect information. Please pay utmost attention in entering your National ID. The individuals over 18 years old are only eligible to receive SIM Cards. An accurate 10 digit ZIP code correspondent to the address is required for registration. Please refer to your utility bills (fixed phone, water, electricity or gas) to get the accurate postal code of your place of residence. Please be careful while entering the postal code and other information since the information recorded in your file (in Irancell system) is the basis for providing you with all Irancell exclusive gifts and services. Your dedicated call center number shall be 900 upon purchasing 0900 SIM card. please find further information in the manual. The subscription fee for the postpaid SIM Cards is calculated for the active days and this amount is IRR 15000 for a full period. Presently, the payment period of Irancell postpaid SIM Cards is two months. (The payment period is calculated as of the beginning of the odd month by the end of the even month). You can monitor your SIM Card account using the following codes: Inquiry and increase of consumption limit	*555*1*2*1# Inquiry and payment of periodical bill	*555*1*2*2# Inquiry and payment of mid-term bill	*555*1*2*3# Inquiry of the bolt-ons balance	*555*1*4# In case the postpaid SIMs bills are not settled within one year as of deactivation, the MSISDN will be vacated and de-registered. What is the authorized credit limit? The amount considered in the postpaid SIM subscribers by default. It means that the subscriber is enabled to enjoy mobile services during the cycle as long as the initial airtime limit is not reached. The subscriber can define its authorized usage limit at the time of purchase based on its usage level. The final price will be calculated based on the chosen authorized usage limit. According to CRC resolution, in case the subscriber has deposited an amount in Irancell as the payment guarantee (authorized usage limit increase) and fails to settle its bill within the defined limit and the SIM card be deactivated (soft/hard suspension) due to indebtedness, the indebtedness will be settled by the said deposit and the credit limit of SIM card will be reset to regular status (prior to request for increase). Regular Delivery: When the postman arrives, the person under whose name the SIM Card has been registered needs to hand over a valid identity document and a copy of the same for identification purposes. The selected SIM card will be sent to the purchaser upon completion of the processes and making the payment in a regular method (during 7 days) to the address communicated by the same. Valid identity documents for Iranian nationals shall include one of the following: National smart card New birth certificate containing a digital photo and National ID (a birth certificate lacking a photo shall not be valid) Old National ID Card together with the smart National ID Card receipt (sealed by an ICT service center, electronic services counter, post office, or civil registry office/a certificate approved by civil registry office/a National ID certificate) A valid identity document for foreign nationals shall include one of the following: A valid passport, Amayesh card, asylum card, identity card, green card or VIP residence permit for foreign nationals with validation date. Other documents such as visa shall not be acceptable. If the postman arrives, the hard copy of registration form (with the particulars of the one who has registered the SIM card) will be sent to you for approval. To receive the purchased SIM card, please approve the form upon reading it fully by your signature and finger print and give it back to the postman together with a copy of your national card. For identification, it is a must that the SIM card owner be present at the time of SIM delivery. As per SIM delivery, if the postman arrives and the subscriber is not present at the venue, the subscriber shall call Irancell call center (by dialing 700 from Irancell lines or 09377000000 from other lines) and ask for the delivery of the product by the postman again. Express Delivery: If you choose express delivery to receive the product within your selected time period, you need to be present at the announced address; otherwise, the product will be sent through regular delivery within 7 days. Note: The order may be delivered by delay in severe weather conditions (snow and rain) Purchase Cancellation: Customers who purchase their mobile SIM card via Irancell Online Stores may cancel their order within 7 business days after placing their order (prior to receiving the SIM card) and ask for a refund. To ask for a refund, the purchaser (the person under whose name the SIM Card is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 700 from Irancell lines or 09377000000 from other lines or may raise their request through online chat with Call Center agents. (It's better to cancel your purchase as soon as possible in order to avoid any payment or waste of time.) If you cancel your order (before receiving the SIM card), the amount will be returned to your Irancell Online Store Wallet and then you will be able to transfer the amount to your bank account or purchase again. Please be noted that refunding the amount to your bank account will be made within 72 working hours; otherwise, you can dial 700 from your Irancell lines or call 09377000000 to follow up the problem in refunding. Please note that in case you wish to cancel your mobile SIM card purchase, you should not take delivery of the purchased product from the postman since the SIM cards delivered will not be subject to refund policy. Only the amounts paid using a bank card connected to a centralized account can be refunded. Payments made using a gift card or other similar cards are not refundable and Irancell undertakes no responsibility for returning the same. In case of purchase cancellation, the cost of delivery will not be refunded. In case you have a multi-product purchase, you cannot cancel one of the products from your purchase basket. You can only cancel your order at once. Otherwise, all the purchased products will be delivered to you. The Limit on Number of SIM Cards Owned by Customers: According to CRA instructions, it is only possible to register for and activate maximum ten (10) SIM Cards for each Iranian natural persons and three (3) SIM Cards for each non-Iranian natural person. If the SIM Card owner decides to transfer the ownership of the SIM Card to another person, they should follow all Irancell's regulations in this regard. All the responsibilities associated with the SIM Card shall lie with the SIM Card owner until the ownership of the SIM Card is legally transferred to another person. If you keep a SIM card in your purchase basket but another person pay for it before you, the SIM card will be sent to the same person who has successfully made the final payment. I, the undersigned, have fully read all the above terms and conditions in regards with purchasing Irancell SIM Card as well as the Subscribers Agreement, and I am fully informed of its provisions and undertake to observe and implement the same. I also accept the probable legal or criminal responsibilities related to registering for and using Irancell SIM Card.

To use Irancell online store services, the Applicant shall accept and comply with the following terms and conditions: The subscriber is responsible for the validity of all the registration information and submitted documents as well as compatibility of the information with the particulars of the individual, not to mention the consequences arising out of presenting false document and incorrect information. Please pay utmost attention in entering your National ID. Only the Applicants above 18 years old can purchase SIM Cards. An accurate 10-digit postal code correspondent to the address is required for registration. Please refer to your utility bills (fixed phone, water, electricity or gas) to get the accurate postal code of your place of residence. Please be careful while entering the postal code and other information since the information recorded in your file (on Irancell system) is the basis for providing you with all Irancell gifts and services. The new generation of SIM Cards can be used as Regular, Micro and Nano SIM cards. The Internet connection fee during the registration process is to be paid by the purchaser which will be calculated based on the tariffs set by the Internet service provider company. In the event of a SIM Card being stolen, lost, or damaged, the subscriber shall immediately inform Irancell either via calling the call center, or by referring to one of the service centers and/or authorized dealers and block the SIM Card. Otherwise, the SIM Card owner shall be held responsible for any consequent misuse. If the Prepaid SIM Card has no transaction within 90 days as of SIM Card activation (except for free usages) Irancell may, according to the terms and conditions set out under Prepaid Subscriber's Contract, either hard suspend or deregister the SIM Card considering the account balance. Regular Delivery: When the postman arrives, the person under whose name the SIM Card has been registered needs to hand over a valid identity document and a copy of the same for identification purposes. Upon completing the process and making the payment, the selected SIM Card will be sent by regular mail, within 7 working days, to the address announced by the subscriber. Valid identity documents for Iranian nationals shall include one of the following: Smart national ID Card New birth certificate containing a digital photo and National ID (a birth certificate lacking a photo shall not be valid) Old National ID Card together with the smart National ID Card receipt (sealed by an ICT service center, electronic services counter, post office, or civil registry office/a certificate approved by civil registry office/a National ID certificate) A valid identity document for foreign nationals shall include one of the following: A valid passport, Amayesh card, identity card, green card or VIP residence permit for foreign nationals. Other documents such as visa shall not be acceptable. When the postman arrives, the hard copy of registration form (including particulars of the SIM Card owner) will be provided for receiver’s approval. Before receiving the purchased SIM Card, please read the information, sign the registration form bearing your fingerprint and return it to the postman along with a copy of National Card. The owner's presence at the time of delivery is a must, for identification purposes. If the postman arrives at the announced address and the Subscriber is not present, the subscriber may call Irancell Call Center by dialing 700 from Irancell lines or 09377000000 from other lines and ask for delivery of the product by the postman again. Express Delivery: If you choose express delivery, in order to receive the product within your selected time period, you need to be present at the announced address; otherwise, the product will be sent through regular mail within 7 working days. Note: In bad weather conditions (rain and snow), the delivery may be delayed. Purchase Cancellation: Customers who purchase their SIM Cards via Irancell Online Stores may cancel their order within 7 working days after placing their order (prior to receiving the modem) and ask for a refund. To ask for a refund, the customer (the person under whose name the SIM Card is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 700 from Irancell lines or 09377000000 from other lines or may raise their request through online Call Center agents. (It's better to cancel your purchase as soon as possible, in order to avoid any extra payment or waste of time.) If you cancel your order (before receiving SIM Card), the amount will be returned to your Irancell Online Store Wallet and then you will be able to transfer the amount to your bank account or purchase again. Please note that the related amount will be refunded to your bank account within 72 working hours; otherwise, you may follow the refund by dialing 700 from your Irancell SIM Card or 09377000000 from other lines. Please note that in case you wish to cancel your SIM Card purchase, you should not take delivery of the purchased product from the postman since the delivered SIM Card will not be subject to refund policy. Only the payments using a bank card connected to a centralized account can be refunded. Payments made using a gift card or other similar cards are not refundable and Irancell undertakes no responsibility for returning the same. If the purchase is canceled the delivery cost will not be refunded. The Limit on Number of SIM Cards Owned by Customers: Please note that according to CRA instructions, it is only possible to register for and activate maximum ten (10) SIM Cards for each Iranian natural person and three (3) SIM Cards for each non-Iranian natural person. If the SIM Card owner decides to transfer the ownership of the SIM Card to another person, they should follow all Irancell's regulations in this regard. All the responsibilities associated with the SIM Card shall lie with the SIM Card owner until the ownership of the SIM Card is legally transferred to another person. In case you keep a SIM Card in your cart and another customer buys the same SIM Card and makes the payment, it will be sent for the one who has made the final payment earlier. I, the undersigned, have fully read all the above “terms and conditions on purchasing Irancell SIM Card” as well as the “Subscribers Agreement”, and I am fully informed of its provisions and undertake to observe and implement the same. I also accept the responsibilities with respect to probable legal or criminal misuses related to registering for and using Irancell SIM Card.

Customer Obligations: Before purchasing any TD-LTE modem, the Customer shall check Irancell network coverage in the intended area using the “coverage map” available on Irancell website.‌ In order to use Irancell services and products, the Customer shall accept the terms and conditions of the related service as well as the present terms and conditions. The Customer shall be responsible to enter accurate and correct identity information while purchasing a service or product. In case any inaccurate information is entered by the Customer, central authentication system will not be able to generate reference number; therefore, service registration and activation will not be possible and Irancell shall have no responsibility in this regard. The Customer shall pay the payable amount stated in Irancell Online Store via available online payment gateway. The Customer undertakes to prepare the required documents and provide them to the postman at the time of delivering the package. Otherwise, the postman may avoid delivering the package.‌‌ The Customer undertakes to avoid receiving damaged packages from postman. Irancell shall not be responsible if, after receiving the package, the Customer finds out that it is damaged.‌ The Customer undertakes to provide updated information and documents at the time of placing the order. In case any discrepancy is discovered at any stage, Irancell shall be entitled to avoid delivering the product or activating the service.‌‌‌‌ The Customer shall provide the 10-digit postal code of its domicile to be registered.‌‌ Please refer to your utility bills (fixed phone, water, electricity or gas) to get the accurate postal code of your place of residence. Please be careful while entering the postal code and other information since the information recorded in your file (in Irancell system) is the basis for providing you with all Irancell gifts and services. Irancell Obligations: Irancell undertakes to deliver to the Customer the purchased product or service within the specified period and in accordance with the terms and conditions referred to on Irancell Online Store website.‌ Irancell shall post the purchased product to the address announced by the Customer. In the event that the Customer pays the price of a product or service the provision of which is found to be impossible later, Irancell shall refund the amount to the Customer. Purchase Cancellation: Customers who purchase their TD-LTE modem and SIM Card via Irancell Online Stores may cancel their order within 7 business days after placing their order (prior to receiving the product) and ask for a refund.‌‌ To ask for a refund, the purchaser (the person under whose name the SIM Card is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 707 (from Irancell lines or 09377070000 (from other lines or may raise their request through online chat with Call Center agents.‌‌ (It's better to cancel your purchase as soon as possible in order to avoid any payment or waste of time.)‌ If you cancel your order (before receiving the product), the amount will be returned to your Irancell Online Store Wallet and then you will be able to transfer the amount to your bank account or purchase again.‌ Please note that in case you wish to cancel your purchase, you should not take delivery of the purchased product from the postman. Money-back Guarantee Terms: Customers who purchase their TD-LTE only modem and SIM Card via Irancell Online Stores may ask for a refund within 7 business days after activating their product (after receiving the product). It should be noted that the refund request shall be approved by the Technical Team of Network confirming the lack of appropriate coverage which can be examined merely based on the address registered.‌‌ To ask for a refund, the purchaser (the person under whose name the SIM Card is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 707 (from Irancell lines) or 09377070000 (from other lines) or may raise their request through online chat with Call Center agents.‌‌ Customers who purchase their TD-LTE SIM Card through Irancell Online Stores may return their SIM Card within 30 days after purchase.‌‌ To ask for returning their SIM Card, the purchaser (the person to whose name the SIM Card is registered) may contact Irancell Call Center by dialing 707 (from Irancell lines) or 09377070000 (from other lines) or may raise their request through online Call Center agents.‌‌ Only the amounts paid using a bank card connected to a centralized account can be refunded. Payments made using a gift card or other similar cards are not refundable and Irancell undertakes no responsibility for returning the same. The return of dual-purpose modems (TD&FD Support) is not possible due to the provision of any mobile or fixed internet services. The Limit on Number of SIM Cards Owned by Customers:‌‌ Please note that according to CRA instructions, it is only possible to register for and activate maximum ten (10) SIM Cards for each Iranian natural persons and three (3) SIM Cards for each non-Iranian natural person.‌ If the SIM Card owner decides to transfer the ownership of the SIM Card to another person, they should follow all Irancell's regulations in this regard.‌‌ All the responsibilities associated with the SIM Card shall lie with the SIM Card owner until the ownership of the SIM Card is legally transferred to another person.‌‌‌ In case of change of ownership, the new owner shall not be able to request for a money-back guarantee. Regular Delivery: When the postman arrives, the person under whose name the SIM Card has been registered needs to hand over a valid identity document and a copy of the same for identification purposes.‌ Valid identity documents for Iranian nationals shall include one of the following: Smart National ID Card New birth certificate containing a digital photo and National ID (a birth certificate lacking a photo shall not be valid) ‌ Old National ID Card together with the smart National ID Card receipt (sealed by an ICT service center, electronic services counter, post office, or civil registry office/a certificate approved by civil registry office/a National ID certificate)‌ A valid identity document for foreign nationals shall include one of the following: A valid passport, Amayesh card, identity card, green card or VIP residence permit for foreign nationals. Other documents such as visa shall not be acceptable. If the postman arrives at the announced address and the Subscriber is not present, the Subscriber may call Irancell Call Center by dialing 707 (from Irancell lines) or 09377070000 (from other lines) and ask for delivery of the product by the postman again. Express Delivery: If you choose express delivery to receive the product within your selected time period, you need to be present at the announced address; otherwise, the product will be sent through regular delivery within 7 days.
